opportunities.title: Senior Software Engineer
opportunities.description: Develop and maintain critical software applications for the talent marketplace.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in software development
Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP)

opportunities.title: Lead Frontend Developer
opportunities.description: Lead a team of frontend developers, drive technical excellence, and mentor junior engineers. Define frontend strategy and best practices.
requirements: Strong understanding of web performance and accessibility

opportunities.title: Frontend Architect
opportunities.description: Design and oversee the implementation of scalable and maintainable frontend architecture. Evaluate new technologies and set technical direction.
requirements: Experience in designing large-scale frontend systems
Deep knowledge of frontend frameworks and patterns

opportunities.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
opportunities.description: Develop both client-side and server-side components for web applications. Work across the full technology stack.
requirements: Proficiency in frontend (React/Angular/Vue) and backend (Node.js/Python/Java) technologies

opportunities.title: Principal Frontend Engineer
opportunities.description: Drives technical vision and provides expert guidance for complex frontend projects. Mentors senior engineers and influences frontend architecture across the organization.
requirements: Expertise in multiple frontend frameworks (React, Angular, Vue)
Proven track record of leading large-scale frontend projects
Deep understanding of web performance, security, and accessibility
Excellent system design and communication skills

opportunities.title: Engineering Manager (EM) – Frontend
opportunities.description: Leads and mentors a team of frontend engineers, responsible for project delivery, technical excellence, and career growth of team members. Collaborates with product and design teams.
requirements: 8+ years of software development experience with significant frontend focus
2+ years of engineering management or tech lead experience
Excellent people management and communication skills

opportunities.title: Director of Engineering – UI/UX Platforms
opportunities.description: Sets strategic direction for UI/UX platforms and foundational frontend technologies. Leads multiple engineering teams, drives innovation, and ensures alignment with business goals.
requirements: 12+ years of engineering experience, with at least 5 years in a leadership role
Extensive experience in building and scaling UI platforms and design systems
Strong technical background in frontend technologies and architecture
Proven ability to lead and inspire large engineering teams

nodes.description: High-Demand Skill (Developing): Implementing and promoting sustainable in-flight practices.

nodes.description: Skill to Develop (Advanced): Expert in de-escalating serious passenger conflicts. Learning: 'Advanced De-escalation Strategies'.
